op.title: Is Daytripper the secret to platinum?
op.body: Every human being should be forced to take Daytripper. Mandated weekly or even daily doses. I believe this will usher in the next renaissance of American music and art. Thoughts?

replies.body: were you high when you wrote this post

FP, i think Daytripper is a very powerful medicine that can be of great benefit to everyone, but we both know that if the MAN gets his grubby paws on it that will be the day that it becomes just another instrument of control and violence
Cope harder guys, the People's Liberation Loveboat sails strong :-)
